p: TB in SARS patients has been reported in several studies from TB endemic countries such as Singapore, China, or Taiwan [ 24, 25], all with known TB patients that acquired SARS and in individuals that developed TB after recovery from SARS [ 25]. The transient immunosuppression characterized both conditions [ 26], a reason for poorer IgG antibody response and a delayed viral clearance in coinfected SARS patients [ 24]. Also, the use of corticoid therapy in SARS added even more on immunosuppression [ 24].
